      The Story So Far..

      You slept in too late and your friends went to explore the cave without you

      Look for clues they may have left behind to catch up to them

      Climb walls and use your trusty rope to reach cave exits

      Controls/Instructions

      A, D - Move left and right

      W, S - Press repeatedly to climb up and down walls

      SpaceBar - Jump

      Find your way to the exit and collect Mementos along the way!

    Controls:

    A, D - left and right

    W, S - Press repeatedly to climb up and down walls

    SpaceBar - Jump
